profile.name: Henrik Joreteg
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Xchart, Inc.
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with expertise in building scalable and maintainable applications using JavaScript, React, Redux, and IndexedDB. Passionate about database sharding and exploring new technologies to improve efficiency and performance.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Xchart, Inc.
description: Designed and implemented a modular Redux store architecture for efficient state management in complex applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including idb-keyval, tiny-object-hash, and feather-app.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of several open-source projects, including redux-bundler-react and redux-bundler-example.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Built small utility libraries using JavaScript, including idb-keyval and tiny-object-hash.
